32  kAxisY,

35 
36 // Enum for body axes (for roll, pitch, yaw rotations)
37 enum class RotationSpace {
38  kBody = 0, // an intrinsic Euler rotation (about rotated body axes)
39  kInertial // an extrinsic Euler rotation (about axes fixed in inertial space)
40 };

51 class EulerAngles {
52 public:
53  typedef Vector<Axis, 3> Axes;

58 
63  enum EulerType {
64  kInvalid,
65  // Proper Euler Angles
66  kZXZ=0,
67  kXYX,
68  kYZY,
69  kZYZ,
70  kXZX,
71  kYXY,
72  // Tait-Bryan Angles
73  kXYZ,
74  kXZY,
75  kYXZ,
76  kYZX,
77  kZXY,
78  kZYX
79  };
